title: Levkovich on factors impacting equities.
summary: As a guest host on CNBC's "Squawk Box," Citi's Chief U.S. Equities Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses how commodity prices, sovereign credit concerns, currency fluctations and other issues are affecting U.S. economic recovery.
tag-2: As a guest host on CNBC's "Squawk Box," Citi's Chief U.S. Equities Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses how commodity prices, sovereign credit concerns, currency fluctations and other issues are affecting U.S. economic recovery.
